function.name: disp

long.para: disp(x) displays the value of the argument, x.

function.examples:
For example if you had previously created values x and y:
>> disp(x) - 0.9401 e0 - 0.2775 e1 - 0.0973 e2 + 0.1723 e12 >> disp(y) - 0.1855 e0 + 0.3149 e1 + 0.2783 e2 - 0.8882 e12 >> clifford_signature(1,1) >> x = randm(2)
x =
2x2 Cl(1,1) multivector array
>> disp(x) 2x2 Cl(1,1) multivector array
